name: test_e2e_with_logs[035_SQLI_BOOL_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_006` |
| **Name** | Numeric comparison injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `1 AND 1>0`
- **Encoded**: `1%20AND%201%3E0`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~50000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:13:47.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BOOL_006-1769346827298-ghrjou5 pattern_id=SQLI_BOOL_006 uri=/?q=1%20AND%201%3E0 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
